name: The Legend of Heroes I & II Eiyuu Densetsu
overview: The Legend of Heroes I & II Eiyuu Densetsu (The Legend of Heroes I＆II 英雄伝説) is a game released for the Sega Saturn by GMF in Japan in 1998. It contains two RPGs by Falcom, Dragon Slayer: Eiyuu Densetsu and Dragon Slayer: Eiyuu Densetsu II. Though the music has been rearranged, graphics appear to try to recreate their originals on 1980s Japanese home computers (to the point that they do not have smooth scrolling).
